entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 11, 00:00 - 04:00 UTC

Mar 23, 14:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 11/04/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured).
Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS8][DedicatedServers] - Racks BHS0806A02A BHS0806A02B BHS0806A02C
entry.content:
Mar 27, 13:05 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/03/2023 11:33 UTC
End Time : 27/03/2023 12:40 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 27, 12:01 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/03/2023 11:33 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the racks BHS0806A02A BHS0806A02B BHS0806A02C are down
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
